name: Broken Tank Simulator
description:
This is Broken Tank Sim, a top-down shooter where you defend yourself from buzzsaws by shooting them by shooting them and running away. However, when you can shoot and when you can move are Out Of your Control! 

When you can move, you move towards the mouse. When you can shoot, you shoot towards the mouse.

It was developed in collaboration with ItsInTheSystem. We also had major help from the emotional support balloon. 

The game was developed in Unity, we used Piskel for the graphics, BFXR was used for the sound effects, and the music was made in Beatwave.
